column4: this is slightly unrelated to anything specifically ubuntu..... but I got a lifecam VX6000.... is there any hope of getting it working in ubuntu?

nah, not neccessarily GAIM. I'm just looking at some of the utter crap that's getting popular on youtube and have decided i want to make some video replies.
